comment: Óscar "El Conejo (The Rabbit)" Pérez Rojas (born 1 February 1973 in Mexico City) is a Mexican football goalkeeper who currently plays for the Mexican team Pachuca of the Liga MX.He has been capped 54 times for the Mexican national team since 1997. He played four games at the 2002 FIFA World Cup and 2010 FIFA World Cup, and was selected for the 1998 FIFA World Cup but never played. He lives in Staten Island with his girlfriend.
name: Pérez Rojas, Óscar
Óscar Pérez Rojas
